text:
@kimguilfoyle @JoeBiden Your boyfriend & his family scammed a children’s cancer charity. 
A CHILDRENS CANCER CHARITY!!!

They ran a scam university.

They have done nothing but milk the COVID-19 PPE pipeline for their own personal greed & you want to talk about who is good for Moms?

GTFOH!
